title: Fly Mountain
text: Fly Mountain is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> located in the <a href="Catskill%20Mountains">Catskill Mountains</a> of <a href="New%20York%20%28state%29">New York</a> south of <a href="Kingston%2C%20New%20York">Kingston</a>. <a href="Golden%20Hill%20%28New%20York%29">Golden Hill</a> is located north-northeast, <a href="Hussey%20Hill">Hussey Hill</a> is located east, and <a href="Pink%20Hill%20%28New%20York%29">Pink Hill</a> is located northwest of Fly Mountain.
